name: Wizard Fish and the Devil of the Depths
name_original: Wizard Fish and the Devil of the Depths
description:
You are the wizard fish. Cast spells against sword wielding sword fish and pike wielding pikes. Reach the lair of the devil of the depths, and end his evil before it destroys the sea.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD or arrow keys to move around

Point and click where you want to shoot. Hold down the left mouse button to fire continuously.

Press the right mouse button to switch between spells (if you have more than one)
